CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 25, 1973, pg. 1, reads: "Dr. Ralph Abernathy at Ebenezer." Portion of accompanying article by Willa Mae Rice reads: "Abernathy Reflects On Plight of SCLC - Dr. Ralph D. Abernathy, recently re-elected as president of the Southern Christian Leadership Conference at the 16th Annual Convention held at Indianapolis, Ind., reflected his reaction on some of the situations responsible for the plight of the black movement today, while visiting here last weekend.  Invited to Pittsburgh as Men's Day guest of the Ebenezer Baptist Church, the noted Atlanta-based civil rights leader addresses an SCLC Benefit Banquet at Hotel Hilton on Saturday evening, when he said: 'middle class Blacks are deserting the movement which fought to secure their salary jobs.'..."
TitMainTitle: Man, and Ralph Abernathy wearing SCLC buttons, seated on carved wooden bench in Ebenezer Baptist Church
